articles.description: REM sleep behavior disorder (RBD) stops temporary muscle paralysis during REM sleep and leads to people attempting to violently “act out” their dreams during sleep. The condition is curable but has links to Parkinson’s disease. Read on to learn more about the…
articles.content:
REM sleep behavior disorder involves unusual actions or behaviors during the rapid eye movement sleep phase.
The condition is a type of sleep disorder known as a parasomnia. These are sleep disorder… [+6518 chars]
